snippet.title: Epic Party Quest Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2024810/Epic_Party_Quest/

A retro-themed party game for up to 4 players, in which each player takes the role of various now-retired fantasy heroes and relive the story of their epic adventures in a series of highly competitive, fast-paced mini-games.

Epic Party Quest is being developed by Redi Games, an indie studio from Cracow, Poland.
